name: @highcharts/morningstar-connectors
description: Highcharts Dashboards connectors for Morningstar Direct Web Services
author: Highsoft AS

scripts.build: npm run webpack && npm run build:prepare && npm run build:copy && npm run build:pack && npm run build:cleanup
scripts.build:copy: cp -R code/* LICENSE.md README.md build/package/ && cp package-build.json build/package/package.json
scripts.demos: npm run webpack && npm run demos:server
scripts.reset: rm -rf bin/ build/ code/ node_modules/ ; npm i
scripts.test:unit-tests: npm run webpack && node -r ts-node/register --env-file .env test/unit-tests/runtime
scripts.webpack: npm run scripts && webpack && npm run webpack:dts
scripts.webpack:dts: npm run webpack:dts:mc && npm run webpack:dts:mrn && npm run webpack:dts:mts
scripts.webpack:dts:mc: cp src/webpack.d.ts code/morningstar-connectors.d.ts && cp src/webpack.d.ts code/morningstar-connectors.src.d.ts
scripts.webpack:dts:mrn: cp src/webpack.d.ts code/morningstar-rna-news.d.ts && cp src/webpack.d.ts code/morningstar-rna-news.src.d.ts
scripts.webpack:dts:mts: cp src/webpack.d.ts code/morningstar-time-series.d.ts && cp src/webpack.d.ts code/morningstar-time-series.src.d.ts
